languages.text: {n}Сержант качает головой.{/n} "Нет! Хоть вы нам и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}помогли{/d}, а спасать этих сволочей я не хочу и не буду! Но и вам мешать не стану, в память о благодеянии вашем. Спасайтесь, Ваш высокобродие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант только качает головой.{/n} "Нет! Хоть вы нам и помогли, а спасать этих сволочей я не хочу и не буду! Мне они помогать не стали! Но и вам препятствовать не стану, в память о благодеянии вашем. Спасайтесь, Ваш высокобродь".

languages.text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант качает головой.{/n} "Нет! Хоть вы нам и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}помогли{/d}, а спасать этих сволочей я не хочу и не буду! Но и вам мешать не стану, в память о благодеянии вашем. Спасайтесь, Ваш высокобродие".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have helped us, but that doesn't mean I want to or will save these louses! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deed. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have helped us, but that doesn't mean I want to or will save these louses! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deed. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have helped us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have helped us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have helped us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have helped us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Nein! Ihr habt uns vielleicht {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}geholfen{/d}, doch das heißt nicht, dass ich diese Blutsauger rette! Ich werde Euch aber auch nicht aufhalten, zu Ehren Eurer guten Taten. Rettet Euch selbst, {mf|Sir|Madam}."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Nein! Ihr habt uns vielleicht geholfen, doch das heißt nicht, dass ich diese Blutsauger rette! Ich werde Euch aber auch nicht aufhalten, zu Ehren Eurer guten Taten. Rettet Euch selbst, {mf|Sir|Madam}."

languages.text: {n}Le sergent secoue la tête.{/n} « Non ! Vous nous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}filé un coup de main{/d}, mais ça veut pas dire que je sauverai ces enfoirés ! Cela dit, pour vous remercier de ce que vous avez fait, je vous empêcherai pas de partir. Un conseil : sauvez votre peau... »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent secoue la tête.{/n} « Non ! Vous nous avez filé un coup de main, mais ça veut pas dire que je sauverai ces enfoirés ! Cela dit, pour vous remercier de ce que vous avez fait, je vous empêcherai pas de partir. Un conseil : sauvez votre peau... »

languages.text: {n}军士摇了摇头。{/n}“不！或许您确实{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}帮{/d}过我们，但这并不意味着我要救这群吸血鬼！不过，为了报答您的善行，您尽可以离开这里。请您赶快上去吧，长官。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}军士摇了摇头。{/n}“不！或许您确实帮过我们，但这并不意味着我要救这群吸血鬼！不过，为了报答您的善行，您尽可以离开这里。请您赶快上去吧，长官。”

languages.text: {n}軍曹は首を横に振る。{/n}「あなたは我々を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}助けてくれた{/d}かもしれないが、だからといって、私がこのヒル共を救うことにはならない！しかしあなたの善行に敬意を表し、あなたが去るのを止めることはしない。ご自由にされよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は首を横に振る。{/n} 「あなたは我々を助けてくれたかもしれないが、だからといって、私がこのヒルを救うことにはならない！しかしあなたの善行に敬意を表し、あなたが去るのを止めることはしない。ご自由にされよ」

languages.text: {n}El sargento niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¡No! Puede que nos haya {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}ayudado{/d}, ¡pero eso no significa que vaya a salvar a estas sanguijuelas! Aunque tampoco impediré que se vaya, por sus buenas acciones. Sálvese, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento niega con la cabeza.{/n}«¡No! Puede que nos haya ayudado, ¡pero eso no significa que vaya a salvar a estas sanguijuelas! Pero tampoco impediré que se vaya, por sus buenas acciones. Sálvese, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}Çavuş, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır! Bize {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}yardım etmiş olmanız{/d} bu sülükleri kurtaracağım anlamına gelmez! Lakin yaptığınız iyiliğin hatırına gitmenize de mâni olmayacağım. Kendinizi kurtarın efendim."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head.{/n} "No! You may have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us, but that doesn't mean that I will be saving these leeches! But I won't stop you from leaving either, in honour of your good deeds. Save yourself, {mf|sir|ma'am}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır! Bize yardım etmiş olsanız da bu sülükleri kurtarmayacağım! Lakin yaptığınız iyiliğin hatırına gitmenizi de engellemeyeceğim. Kendinizi kurtarın efendim."
